about_the_game:
One more round a thousand times


In 1000 Rogues you will be sending up to 1000 heroes on their separate quests, each one contained in their own retro-console. As they auto-battle into glorious victory or crushing defeat, it will fall upon your shoulders to equip them for success or at least gather their remains.

The Puzzle within thousand puzzles


Each time you boot up a new machine you select a hero and send them on their merry way which may end only in two ways - they will either succeed or perish in the dungeon. Regardless of their fate, any item recovered by the hero can be transferred to another hero onto another machine or stored for later use. Remember, you haven’t min-maxed unless you have min-maxed the min-maxing.

Thousands and thousands of items


All of your auto-battling heroes will courageously always move to the right - as in all good retro games. However, this doesn’t mean they’re self-sufficient and it is in your interest to stack the odds in their favour. Stack them up with potions, items, and campaign gear. Also keep that floppy disc at hand. You never know when you will need to SAVE to save your heroes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You have played roguelikes before, but have you played 1000 at the same time? In 1000 Rogues, the retro RPG auto-battler you literally can! Step right in, plug in your vintage gaming systems and get ready to delve into the retro dungeon.
